name: EX-3
description: '''EX-3''' was a Spanish [[mákina]] group composed of David Amo, Alex Castellano, and Julio Navas. They are known for being one of the most representative groups of the 90's Spanish "Mákina" phenomenon, at the time when this genre crossed over from [[dance club]]s to the [[pop music]] arena. Popular songs by EX-3 include "Ex-P-Cial", "Extres", and "Extres-A-2".
